title: Man's pantaloons
text: Pants of this cut are worn by men in many parts of Guatemala and were inspired by contact with Europeans. The embroidered pattern is typical of the designs used in Santiago Atitl√°n. A belt (banda), such as example #5 in the case, would be wrapped around the top and securely tied to hold the pants in place.
description: purple and white striped ground with bands of embroidered birds on legs, embroidery, handwoven 3 selvage material
creditline: Gift of Richard Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
